title: (x) Ensemble - Kontrapunkt (Sans) {Angel}
content:
Sorry for the poor quality of the picture but that's the only one I've found. It's the typography of the slogan for Nicolas Sarkozy's french presidential campaign.

Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [CONGRES UMP 42.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019032942/http:/typophile.com/files/CONGRES%20UMP%2042.JPG) | 81.41 KB |
author: kuroneko

comments.content: Reminds me of Cholla wide but that ain't it.

In a previous thread, the ID was Kontrapunkt (Sans) which seems reasonable to me.

[http://typophile.com/node/32748](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019032942/http:/typophile.com/node/32748 "http://typophile.com/node/32748")
Isn’t Kontrapunkt a slab-serif face? At least the one I downloaded for free is.
I think that the graphic designer who's working for the UMP has just erased the serifs ...
